id.description: The unique identifier of the constructor.

name.description: The name of the constructor, typically used for display purposes.

fullName.description: The full name of the constructor.

countryId.description: The identifier of the country of origin of the constructor.

bestChampionshipPosition.description: The best finishing position achieved by the constructor in a World Constructors' Championship.

bestStartingGridPosition.description: The best starting grid position achieved by the constructor in a race.

bestRaceResult.description: The best finishing position achieved by the constructor in a race.

bestSprintRaceResult.description: The best finishing position achieved by the constructor in a sprint race.

totalChampionshipWins.description: The total number of World Constructors' Championship titles won by the constructor.

totalRaceEntries.description: The total number of races entered by the constructor.

totalRaceStarts.description: The total number of races started by the constructor.

totalRaceWins.description: The total number of races won by the constructor.

total1And2Finishes.description: The total number of races in which the constructor finished in both 1st and 2nd place.

totalRaceLaps.description: The total number of laps completed by the constructor.

totalPodiums.description: The total number of podium finishes achieved by the constructor.

totalPodiumRaces.description: The total number of races in which the constructor finished on the podium.

totalPoints.description: The total number of points accumulated by the constructor.

totalChampionshipPoints.description: The total number of World Constructors' Championship points accumulated by the constructor.

totalPolePositions.description: The total number of pole positions achieved by the constructor.

totalFastestLaps.description: The total number of fastest laps set by the constructor.

totalSprintRaceStarts.description: The total number of sprint races started by the constructor.

totalSprintRaceWins.description: The total number of sprint races won by the constructor.
